Literature.Title: Identification of A Novel Antibacterial Peptide from Atlantic Mackerel belonging to the GAPDH-Related Antimicrobial Family and Its In Vitro Digestibility.
Literature.Author: Offret C, Fliss I, Bazinet L, Marette A, Beaulieu L

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus megaterium B301(MIC=>1050µM),Blautia coccoides ATCC 29236(MIC=>1050µM),Bifidobacterium longum subsp. infantis ATCC 15697(MIC=>1050µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>1050µM),Enterococcus faecium L1(MIC=>1050µM),Lactobacillus acidophilus ATCC 4356(MIC=263µM),Listeria ivanovii ATCC 19119(MIC=131µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 15313(MIC=131µM),Micrococcus luteus 272(MIC=263µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>1050µM),Bacteroides thetaiotaomicron ATCC 29741(MIC=263µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>1050µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>1050µM),Vibrio parahaemolyticus ALN-0312(MIC=>1050µM)
